name: Jetpack Chef
description:
THIS GAME MADE FOR MINI JAM 56

Second quarter of 23rd century. After chemical wars, earth turned into a war zone. After this war, humans moved to sky for a better life. But they couldn't escape from toxic gases. Robots took control and imprisoned man inside their homes. But Chef Hamid was run out of money. So he fried his donuts, got his jetpack and started to deliver. Eveb if it is illegal.

You are a chef with a JETPACK. You fried your donuts. And you gonna deliver these donuts with your JETPACK. Fly with W, A and D keys. Fall with S. Get your donuts from your home, and deliver them to the donut lovers located at very east and west of map. Throw donuts with left mouse button and don't get caught by robot cops.

Softwares that i used:

  • -Unity
  • -LMMS
  • -Paint.net
  • -BFXR
